title: Password Strength Checker
description: Write a program that checks the strength of a password. If the password has at least 8 characters, at least one uppercase letter, at least one lowercase letter, and at least one digit, the password is 'Strong'. If the password has at least 6 characters, at least one uppercase letter, and at least one lowercase letter, the password is 'Medium'. If the password has less than 6 characters, the password is 'Weak'.
